item.title: Just Discovered KGSBash…
item.dc:creator: BenGoZen
item.description: I’ve been feeling rather off the last couple of days. Not sick or anything, but just feeling a little out of it. Haven’t really felt like studying, but it’s been fun playing a casual game here and there. But on a more important note, I just discovered a site called KGSBash. And if you’re wondering […]
item.content:encoded:
I’ve been feeling rather off the last couple of days. Not sick or anything, but just feeling a little out of it. Haven’t really felt like studying, but it’s been fun playing a casual game here and there. But on a more important note, I just discovered a site called KGSBash. And if you’re wondering what it’s about, here are some that had me laughing…
#54Â 
adoreme: it is said that kgs has a secret end stage
adoreme: get 9dan
adoreme: and beat 50 9dans in a row
adoreme: then tartrate will appear as the endboss
#49Â Â 
RayFrost [2k]: I played a 3p today… with 9 handicap
RayFrost [2k]: I lost.
RayFrost [2k]: 3p is strong.
LazyDragon [3k]: i once played a 5p with 9hc – also lost …
tellone [2k]: i once played a very drunk 2p who forgot which collor he had
tellone [2k]: and i still lost
Oh KGS… Good times…

item.title: New KGS Account
item.dc:creator: BenGoZen
item.description: So ironically my friend Todd happens to have been using the screenname “zenix” for like all his life. Â Now mind you… I pronounce mine “zeh-nix” while he pronounces his “zee-nix.” Â Anyhow, although the odds are like a bajillion to one (and those who know the statistics feel free to correct me) that we made the […]
item.content:encoded: So ironically my friend Todd happens to have been using the screenname “zenix” for like all his life. Â Now mind you… I pronounce mine “zeh-nix” while he pronounces his “zee-nix.” Â Anyhow, although the odds are like a bajillion to one (and those who know the statistics feel free to correct me) that we made the same screenname, I just thought it’d be better if I took the highroad and made a bengozen account anyhow since this is the brand I’m trying to blog with. Â With that in mind, I’ll probably be getting the KGS Plus soon, and will be reviewing that as soon as I make some use of it.
